seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## Microsoft's new AI skills are coming to Copilot+ PCs - including some for all Windows 11 users  
Microsoft has unveiled a range of new and improved AI skills for its Copilot+ PCs, with some features rolling out to all Windows 11 users. The announcement highlights expanded capabilities designed to enhance productivity and user experience, though specific details on the skills and their availability timeline remain under wraps.  

### Why It Matters  
The integration of advanced AI features into Windows 11 and Copilot+ PCs signals Microsoft's commitment to embedding AI deeper into everyday computing. This move could streamline workflows, improve accessibility, and set a new standard for AI-assisted productivity tools. As AI becomes a core component of operating systems, users may see faster adoption of these technologies across industries.
